api.name: Servlet 2.4 & JSP 2.0
api.summarydescription: JavaTM Servlet technology provides web developers with a simple, consistent mechanism for extending the functionality of a web server and for accessing existing business systems.
api.description: JavaTM Servlet technology provides web developers with a simple, consistent mechanism for extending the functionality of a web server and for accessing existing business systems. A servlet can almost be thought of as an applet that runs on the server side -- without a face. Java servlets have made many web applications possible.
